name: gatsby-starter-default
description: A simple starter to get up and developing quickly with Gatsby
author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=staging gatsby build --prefix-paths && gh-pages -d public
scripts.deploy-staging-clean: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=staging gatsby build --prefix-paths && gh-pages -d public
scripts.deploy-production: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=production gatsby build && firebase use default && firebase deploy && firebase open hosting:site
scripts.deploy-production-clean: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=production gatsby build && firebase use default && firebase deploy && firebase open hosting:site
